caption.center: THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF ILLINOIS, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. LOUIS WILKINS,

court.center: Appellate Court of Illinois, First District.

opinion.posture: APPEAL from the Circuit Court of Cook County; the Hon. JAMES M. BAILEY, Judge, presiding.
opinion.attorneys:
James J. Doherty, Public Defender, of Chicago, (Leonard V. Solomon, Assistant Public Defender, of counsel,) for appellant.
Bernard Carey, State's Attorney, of Chicago, (Kenneth L. Gillis and Roger L. Horwitz, Assistant State's Attorneys, of counsel,) for appellee.
